name: REBEL DUCK: FIGHTERS (Kichex)
description:
This build has a Blocker in the begining so here is the 1 min late version https://hedersonleeh.itch.io/rebel-duck-fighters dont rate only enjoys ;)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Select your Duck, train it and build your Ultimate Bird Fighter in this turn-ish based rpg.

Your duck has a personality of its own, in combat you tell it what to do, but does it trust you enough to listen?

Made in 48 hours for Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020.

Programming by:

  • HedersonLeeh
  • CelisMX

Art and Design:

  • Kichex
  • Nagameco

Music by:

  • Aelsgeon
